name: Shinkai: Video to SRT Converter
description: Converts video files to SRT subtitle files by extracting audio, performing speech recognition, and generating subtitles.
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: video_subtitles
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE video_subtitles (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, video_path TEXT NOT NULL, subtitle_path TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get latest subtitles
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM video_subtitles ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
